name: Dimensions
description:
In the Multiverse everything is possible, so each level is another world, another universe, live this incredible adventure and at the same time go through the history of video games. (Coming Soon) Frantic PVP Multiplayer Where each character is so unique with their mechanics.

A story mode where each level is another universe so the graphics change completely, it can be a 2d world. 3d, abstract worlds, changing the same mechanics and controls
